resources.string: Do you really want to delete this player?
It is necessary at least 4 players to start the game!
Do you want end the current game and go back to the main page?
A party game that will help you discover UBI and Covilh達!
Take a look at the rules at the side menu!
The spy: tries to guess the round\'s location. Infer from others\' questions and answers.
Other players: figure out who the spy is.
Putting up for vote: at any time, a player can try to indict a suspected spy by putting that suspect up for vote.
The player who receives more votes has to reveal his card. In case of a draw, the game proceeds.

If the revealed card is a spy card, then that spy is eliminated. If the only spy alive is eliminated, then non-spies win and each one receive 1 point (the player how started the vote receives 1 extra point).
If the revealed card is a non-spy card, then the spies win and receives 4 points.
Spy guesses: at any time, the spy can reveal that they are the spy and make a guess at what the location is. The round immediately ends.
If the guess is write, then the spies win and receive 4 points. If not, the civilians win and each one receive 1 point.
Players vote on who is a spy and the one who gets more votes has to reveal his card. If everyone get the same amount of votes, then they vote again.

UBI is a public university located in the city of Covilh達, in Portugal. In 2021, it had around 8600 students enrolled in the various courses of its training offer, which covers all academic degrees of Portuguese higher education (bachelors, masters and doctorate), as well as postgraduate courses. The university\'s name reflects the historical region where it is located in Portugal, known as the innermost part of the central region of the country, between the districts of Guarda and Castelo Branco.

UBI is a young, dynamic and constantly developing university. Serving the region, the country and the world is a priority for the Institution through demanding training and research at the highest level, developed in a climate of proximity only possible in medium-sized cities, such as Covilh達.
Hide the phone from the others and discover who you are.
Click the button and pass the phone to the next player.
Figure out who the spy is.
Try to guess the rounds location.
The player that is asking the question should have the phone on his hand!
